1.content:
Welcome to a Story of Regression.
The Location: a Lakeside Resort in the Mountains, where your Family Reunion is going on.

Characters:
Joey Age 10, Zoey's Twin, and possibly our Protagonist
Zoey Age 10, Joey's Twin, and possibly our Protagonist

Amy Age 4, their Little Sister
Kevin Age 15, their Big Brother
John and Lisa, their Parents.

Aunt Eleanor, their Aunt on their Mom's Side
Stevie Age 9, their Cousin and Eleanor's Son
Toby Age 2, Stevie's Baby Brother

Uncle Mark, their Uncle on their Dad's Side

Uncle Horace, another Uncle on Dad's Side
Kara Age 11, Your Cousin, Horace's Daughter
Anna Age 13, Kara's Sister
Sally Age 5, Kara's Sister

Who will we follow on this Journey?
1.title: The Start

11.content:
We'll follow Joey.

What causes the regression?
11.title: Joey

12.content: We'll Follow Zoey, what causes her to Regress?
12.title: Zoey

13.content: We'll Follow the Twins, they're always together. What Causes the Regression?
13.title: Both Twins

choices: They Mess with some sort of Artifact
They get dosed with a Potion
131.content: The Twins Regress due to Some sort of Magical Cause. What happens?
131.title: Something Magical!

choices: One of their Cousins shows them
1312.content: So the Twins Happen upon a Book of Spells and end up Regressing Themselves. How do they come across this Book?
1312.title: They Find a Spellbook

choices: It's a Brown Leather Tome that says "LIBER ARCANUM" in big Letters on the front
It's a Blue Book with Mysterious Writing in some Strange Alphabet
13121.content: The Twins are Having Fun Exploring the Resort when they come Across the Library and Decide to take a Look Inside. It's a Large Half-Decagon of a Room with a Fireplace in the middle and Walls filled with Bookshelves to the Ceiling. 2 Long Tables with nice Chairs are on either side of the fireplace. The two of them Look around for something Interesting to read. After a while of looking, not really finding anything appealing Zoey finds an Odd Book with Weird Inlay on the side and pulls it out. What does the Book look like?
13121.title: The Resort has a Library

131211.content: Zoey Calls Joey over and shows him the book. They set it out on the table and open it up. It's all in Latin(not that they'd really know that) and is filled with mysterious Drawings of Magical Circles and Various Spells. Joey Jokes that maybe it's a Spellbook, Zoey Laughs and Jokes back that maybe they should try one. Joey takes her up on that offer and they pick a Random entry and Begin Reciting it together. What Happens?
131211.title: It's a Brown Leather Tome that says "LI...

1312111.content: The two of them Recite the Words: "PRAETERITIS DIEBUS VENI ITEREM: TEMPUS REGRESSUS!" In a Bit of a Loud voice not really suitable for a Library, Fortunately they're the only ones there at the moment. Does anything happen right away?
1312111.title: It's the Regression Spell

13121111.content: As they finish reciting the spell, the words on the Page Begin Glowing a Brilliant Blue as a Spark of Energy shocks the twins like static electricity. A Mystical wind starts Swirling around the room and the Twins are Swept into the Air, and Begin Glowing with that same blue light as their bodies start to shrink. Will the two of them end up the same Age?
13121111.title: The Spell Activates

131211111.content: The two of them are shocked as the magical energy flows through them, and are even more shocked as they're bodies begin to get smaller, how Far do they Regress?
131211111.title: They'll Still be Twins

1312111111.content: The two of them Shrink very far, by the end they're even smaller than Baby Amy! How young are they now?
1312111111.title: 1-3(Younger than Amy!)

choices: New Outfits for freshly Minted Tots
13121111113.content: The two of them have Regressed 7 years and are now 3 again. Did their Clothes Change with them?
13121111113.title: Top Tier Toddlers(3 Years)

choices: A Little Padded in Training Pants
131211111131.content: As the Magic starts to Fade the Twins notice their Clothes have Changed to Suit their New Ages, Zoey is Wearing a Pair of Skirtalls with a Light Pink Shirt Underneath, and Joey a Matching pair of Shortalls with a Baby Blue shirt Underneath. The Magic finishes up and safely deposits them on the ground. Well a bout an Inch or two off of it. The two of them Plop from the air onto their Butts, which happen to be:
131211111131.title: New Outfits for freshly Minted Tots

choices: Look in the book for a Reverse Spell
1312111111313.content: As the two of them plop on their buts they immediately notice the padding cushioning their fall. The two of them are Suprised and Excited that Magic Exists, but they're not sure what to Feel about accidentally turining themselves into diaper-clad toddlers. The two of them decide to:
1312111111313.title: Well Padded in Cushy Diapers,

13121111113132.content: Before they can do much of anything someone else enters the library, who is it?
13121111113132.title: Interuppted by something

choices: Nope, he's still the same Bro you know
131211111131322.content: Into Library walks their Big Bro Kevin. Has anything changed with him?
131211111131322.title: Their Brother Kevin

1312111111313221.content: Kevin Walks into the Library and notices his 2 Shrunken Siblings, does he Recognize them?
1312111111313221.title: Nope, he's still the same Bro you know

choices: He Remembers what they looked like when they were 3
He Thinks they're supposed to be 3
13121111113132211.content: So He Recognizes them, but why?
13121111113132211.title: Yes

1312111111313222.content: Somehow Kevin has also Gotten Younger. What age is he now?
1312111111313222.title: He Looks Younger?

1312111112.content: The Two of them Shrink Pretty Far, But they're still a bit bigger than Amy. How old are they now.?
1312111112.title: 4-6(Closer to Amy)

choices: Nope, Draped over them like Tents
13121111123.content: The Twins Regress 4 years, back into First Graders. Does the Magic Change their Clothes with them?
13121111123.title: First Grade Again?(6 Years)

choices: They see if they can figure out or find a reversal Spell
131211111231.content: As the Magic starts fading The two of them notice that their clothes have changed. Zoey is wearing a Purple Shirt with Rapunzel on it and Lavender Leggings, and Joey's Wearing a Blue T-Shirt with Paw Patrol on it and Jeans. The magic deposits them onto their feet. The two of them are suprised and excited that Magic, but less so about accidentally making themselves... 6? They guess... What do they do next?
131211111231.title: New Clothes for 1st Grade Woes

1312111112312.content: While thinking the two of them are Interrupted by someone else entering the library. Who is it?
1312111112312.title: Something Interrupts them

131211111231211.content: Their Mom walks in, does she Recognize her Kids in their regressed state?
131211111231211.title: Mom

choices: What Mother Wouldn't recognize her Kids, even Regressed.
She thinks they're supposed to be 6
1312111112312111.content: Why does she Recognize them?
1312111112312111.title: Yep

choices: They're alone in the Room for now.
13121111123121111.content: Lisa walks into the Library, having heard the Twins had been seen heading in there, and is Greeted by a Peculiar Sight, she swears that she's Seeing her Twins but as they were when they were 6. As She Curiously Approaches them the two of the Instictively Blame the other, thinking she'll be mad at them for Regressing. This Confirms it's her Zoey and Joey. She tells them they're not in trouble and asks what Happened. They Explain the Book and the Magic. She's shocked at the idea of Magic but can't Deny the Results. She Looks at it and Discerns it's in Latin. She Picks it up and Has them Follow her back to their room so they can figure this thing out, their Father took Latin in College so he might be able to translate it. The 3 head back to the room, and enter. Who's in at the moment?
13121111123121111.title: What Mother Wouldn't recognize her Kids, ev...

choices: Mom takes them out to get Clothes
They go to the bedroom they'll be staying in
131211111231211112.content: Kevin's Currently out and About, but Dad and Amy are in the room. Amy's Currently Taking a Nap after Playing a Bunch with her Cousins. Dad notices the 2 6 year olds with his wife and is shocked when she tells them they're the twins, but he soon recognizes their features. She explains the story and gives him the book. The twins then both impulsively shout at him to NOT read anything out loud, which causes Amy to shift a bit but not wake up as they apologize for yelling .He's a Bit Rusty at Latin, but luckily the Internet exists, so he'll work on it. He says in the Meanwhile the two of them to Enjoy being 6 for a bit. What Happens next:
131211111231211112.title: Dad and Amy

choices: They Stop by the Diaper Aisle
They stop by the Toy and Game Aisle
1312111112312111121.content: Mom then tells them that since it'll take a while they'll need to get some clothes to fit their smaller figures. She takes them out to the Van, luckily avoiding any relatives on the way, and the two are Strapped into their Carseats(with a Few Adjustments for their smaller size, they were a little small as 10 year olds anyways) and off they are to Walmart. They Shop for some Outfits, Including Swimsuits and PJs. Do they Buy anything else Interesting?
1312111112312111121.title: Mom takes them out to get Clothes

choices: Is Picking up some Extras for Amy
Is getting some Swim Diapers for Toby for Aunt Ellie
13121111123121111211.content: After grabbing the clothes and trying them on, they head off, however instead of going to the checkout their mom heads toward the Diaper Aisle. The two are Confused and ask why they're going there before she Replies that she:
13121111123121111211.title: They Stop by the Diaper Aisle

131211111231211112111.content: She replies she's Just Picking up some Extra _ for Amy to wear to bed because the Package she accidentally didn't have enough left for the entire trip. What does Amy wear to bed?
131211111231211112111.title: Is Picking up some Extras for Amy

1312111112312111121113.content: Amy wets pretty heavy, so she Wears Thick Diapers to Bed. Speaking of Bedwetting, did the Twins wet at 6?
1312111112312111121113.title: Full-On Diapers

13121111123121111211131.content: Does their Mom Remember this?
13121111123121111211131.title: Yep

131211111231211112111311.content: As she Explains herself she Suddenly Remembers that the Twins still were Wetting the bed at 6. Not taking chances she Grabs:
131211111231211112111311.title: Her memory is Jogged

1312111112312111121113111.content: The Twins were just as bad as their Sister, and they're small enough to fit in the same size diapers, so she makes a mental note of it. They Pay for their Items and Head back the hotel, do they do anything on the way?
1312111112312111121113111.title: Diapers

13121111123121111211131111.content: It's Getting Late, it's about 5:30, so She calls her Husband and tells him she's going to pick up dinner. What does she get?
13121111123121111211131111.title: They Get Dinner

131211111231211112111311111.content: She Decides to Grab Mcdonalds. She Asks the Twins if they want Happy Meals, given their shrunken state. What do they say?
131211111231211112111311111.title: McDonalds

choices: They get to the Room without issue
1312111112312111121113111111.content: The twins Enthusiastically Agree on Happy Meals. Their Mom pulls into Mcdonalds and orders 3 Happy Meals with Chicken Nuggets, and 3 Cheeseburger meals for Her, Her Husband and Kevin. She Pays and gets the food and they head back to the Hotel. On the Way Back in:
1312111112312111121113111111.title: HAPPY MEAL!

13121111123121111211131111111.content: The 3 of them manage to make their way back to the room without any Encounters with Family they'd have to explain the situation to. Once there they're greeted by Dad who Managed to Explain the Situation to Kevin well enough(They took Pictures to show him) but isn't quite sure how to explain it to Amy since she's only 4. Amy then rushes in and hugs her mommy before being confused by the two kids with her. Mommy explains that these are her Big Brother and Sister and they did a thing and got smaller. Being 4 she doesn't really think too much of it and gives them a big hug. The Twins take their Happy Meals and Eat with their Baby Sister, who's now that much smaller than them, and them play with the Toys from the Happy Meals. After Eating:
13121111123121111211131111111.title: They get to the Room without issue

131211111231211112111311111112.content: A few Hours Pass by Uneventfully after Dinner, and Eventually it's Bedtime. She Calls the Twins to Her and their Father's Bedroom(they're in a Suite with Multiple Bedrooms) on the Bed is Laid out the Pajamas they Bought at Walmart, but on top of them is a Diaper. She Explains to the Twins that Since they've Regressed to 6-Year Olds she's taking a Precaution since when they were 6 they Still wet the bed like Amy. The Twins are suprised by their Mom wanting to Diaper them for the first time in several years. How do they React?
131211111231211112111311111112.title: Skip to Bedtime

1312111112312111121113111111121.content: The Twins, despite being aprehensive about wearing diapers again, agree they'd rather do it than risk waking up in a Wet Bed, Especially with Amy there. They agree to be diapered. Joey goes first, He's a Bit annoyed by their Mom helping him take off his clothes, but lets her help, after Removing his Shirt and Jeans, she Pulls off his Undies and Slides the Diaper Under his butt. She Rubs rash cream in and Powders him thoroughly before Taping it firmly between his legs. He blushes at the change and the Poofiness between his legs. Zoey Giggles at his embarassment , but is Interuppted by Mom picking her up and Proceeding to undress her as well. She Pulls off her panties and Repeats the Routine with her, Joey Giggling at her this time. After the two are securly padded she Helps them into their Pajama Shirts before asking them if they want to wear pants or sleep in just their diapers as it's pretty warm tonight. The two of them:
1312111112312111121113111111121.title: They Agree to be Diapered

choices: They manage to get to their room
Amy gets to see them in their Diapers
13121111123121111211131111111211.content: Despite their Embarassment it is pretty warm, so the two of them agree between themselves to go without pants. Their Mom helps them down and they leave their Parents from for the room they'll be staying in, while their Mom prepares for getting Amy Ready. Do they run into Amy on the way?
13121111123121111211131111111211.title: It IS pretty warm.

choices: Decide to Sleep in the same Bed
131211111231211112111311111112112.content: Their Decision to forego pants unfortunately comes back to bite them as they immediately encounter Amy who's headed to see Mommy to get ready for bed. She's Confused by what she's seeing. "Big Bro, Big Sis, why are you in Diapies?" They explain, as best they can to a 4-year old at least, that they have to wear them at night like she does because they shrank. She kinda gets it, and goes on her way. The two of them breath a sigh of relief, despite still being a embarassed about being caught in diapers by their baby sister, even if she doesn't actually care about it. The two of them head back to their room, where a Stepstool has been Installed to help them into bed. The two of them:
131211111231211112111311111112112.title: Amy gets to see them in their Diapers

choices: They Wake up on their Own.
1312111112312111121113111111121121.content: The two of them manage to reach their room fine, and find their parents have placed a Stepstool to help them get into bed. The two of them decide it'd be neat to take advantage of their shrunken state and sleep in the same bed like they sometimes did as little kids. They hop into one of the beds and attempt to go to sleep, but quickly notice something feels like it's missing. Zoey suddenly hops up and goes over to her backpack and Pulls out something. Joey is Shocked to see two Near-Identical Teddy Bears, both White, one with a Blue Nose, the Other Pink. Zoey Brings them over and hands the Blue-Nosed one to Joey, who Hugs it tight. "You Brought Bearry and Carrie?" He Happily Exclaims. Zoey explains she Always sneaks them along on trips because them being there just helps her sleep better. Joey Hugs her and the two of them once again try sleeping, this time Clutching their Beloved Teddy Bears they Stopped Sleeping with a little over a year ago, and Manage to Fall asleep Easily. The Next Morning:
1312111112312111121113111111121121.title: Decide to Sleep in the same Bed

13121111123121111211131111111211211.content: The next Morning, the twins slowly begin to awaken, the two of them in an Adorable position, legs splayed out, covers kicked off, facing eachother and tightly clutching their Teddies. They begin to awaken, and pull themselves up into a sitting position before rubbing the crusties out of their eyes. The two of them yawn a little before hugging eachother, they both slept amazingly! The two of them then turn their attention to the state of their Underwear, they're:
13121111123121111211131111111211211.title: They Wake up on their Own.

choices: Go to Mom and get changed
Play with their Toys and wait for everyone else to wake up
131211111231211112111311111112112111.content: Mom was right to put them in Diapers, the two of them are SOAKED. They Poke at their Diapers, the Squish Confirming it. The two giggle a bit at their situation. Wet Diapers, Sleeping in the Same Bed with their Teddies. The two of them are Kinda Enjoying being 6 again. The two of them decide to:
131211111231211112111311111112112111.title: Soaked!

choices: A 'Potty Training' spell. Joey casts it on Toby-he's still in diapers!
A "No Bedwetting" spell. Zoey casts it on Amy & Sally to save their sheets.
A "No Terrible Twos" spell. They cast it on Toby-his tantrums are annoying!
They put the spellbook away for now.
1312112.content: What kind of spell is it?
1312112.title: It's a Different Spell

13121124.content: Remember they don't know what the spells are or do. So what random spell did they pick?
13121124.title: Another spell...

1313.content: The Twins are affected by some sort of Magical Potion?
1313.title: They get dosed with a Potion

13131.content: What was the potion currently inside of?
13131.title: Yep

132.content: What Scientific Thing Causes the Regression?
132.title: Something Sciencey!

1323.content: They Encounter some sort of Chemical Concotion?
1323.title: Some sort of Chemical Concotion

choices: One or Both of the Twins'
133.title: A Wish Comes True

choices: Pull-Ups during the day, diapers to bed and naptime.
Pull-Ups to bed, undies during the day.
142.content: What's Toby's state of undergarments?
142.title: Toby

info.brief_description: A kid at a Family Reunion goes on an Adventure. Regression and Hijinks Ensue.
info.description:
Rules:
Focus on Physical Regression. Mental Regression can come with the Physical Regression though.
No Death, Abuse, Sex, "Fluids" Creepy Stuff Fetishes Etc.
Have Fun.
